title: (OCE) LF ADC/SUP for flex and tourneys
body:
Hey guys, currently looking for an ADC/Sup for flex and tourneys.

Requirements:
- Discord with mic
- Silver 1+
- 18+

Add me in game (CrimFaker) OR comment on this post.

Cheers!

replies.body:
